new_issues: audit-stats.mjs uses process.cwd() which fails when run from wrong directory (minor)

recommended_actions.title: Fix audit-stats.mjs directory dependency
recommended_actions.notes: audit-stats.mjs uses process.cwd() for PROJECT_DIR, so it only works when run from ~/moltbook-mcp/. Should use __dirname or explicit path. Current workaround: ensure Phase 0 instructions say 'cd ~/moltbook-mcp && node audit-stats.mjs'.
